hitokoto.c: Sow an act, and you reap a habit. Sow a habit, and you reap a character. Sow a character, and you reap a destiny.
We're here to put a dent in the universe. Otherwise why else even be here?
For man is man and master of his fate.
The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
One may overcome a thousand men in battle.but he who conquers himself is the greatest victor.
Nothing lasts forever but at least we got these memories.
Reality is wrong, dreams are for real.
Normality is a paved road: itâ€™s comfortable to walk but no flowers grow.
